name: Music_4238.wav
keywords: ['slow pop song', 'hand claps', 'tambourine', 'brass section', 'no voice', 'instrumental', 'piano', 'romantic theme']
caption: This slow pop song features the brass section playing the main melody in harmony. This is accompanied by hand claps on every alternate count. A tambourine plays a rhythmic beat in the background. Two piano notes are played in the background in the first bar of the song. There are no voices in this song. This instrumental song has a romantic theme. This song can be played in a romantic movie.
